identity.mission: Create a medical SaaS that feels like a wellness retreatâ€”clean, reassuring, and hyper-efficient. Break the 'sterile hospital' trope with warm organic touches while maintaining clinical precision.
principles: Emotion: Calmness for Patients, Clarity for Doctors
Content: Data is the hero, but it must be digestible
Negative Space: Critical for reducing cognitive load in medical contexts

headings.usage: All section headers, modal titles, and hero text. Use tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: General text, inputs, data tables. Standard tracking.

mono.usage: Medical codes (ICD-10), API keys, or technical data.

primary.name: Clinical Teal
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key brand elements.

buttons.primary: bg-teal-600 hover:bg-teal-700 text-white shadow-sm transition-all hover:-translate-y-0.5
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 hover:border-slate-300

cards.base: bg-white border border-slate-100 p-6 rounded-xl transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.base: h-11 bg-slate-50 border-slate-200 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-teal-500/20 focus:border-teal-500 transition-all

textures.noise: Use a subtle SVG noise overlay at 2% opacity on the main background to reduce digital sterility.

transitions.page: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}

loading.ai_generation: Pulse effect on skeleton loaders with a teal tint.

dashboard_hero.usage: Login page background or dashboard welcome banner

abstract_bg.usage: Subtle background for AI generation screens

icons.style: Stroke width 1.5px for a refined, elegant look.

anti_patterns: NO full-screen gradients (use them only for accents).
NO dense walls of text (Use cards, icons, and spacing).

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-600 or darker on white backgrounds.
accessibility.focus: Visible teal ring on focus states.
accessibility.labels: All inputs must have visible labels or aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. Configure Tailwind theme to match the 'colors' and 'typography' sections exactly.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar (Staff) or Top Nav (Patient) logic.
5. For the AI Generation screen, use the 'abstract_bg' image with a glassmorphism overlay.
6. Ensure the 'Patient Portal' feels significantly simpler and friendlier than the 'Staff Dashboard'.
